abstract: JPMorgan Chase has agreed to pay $100 million to settle a lawsuit filed by customers who said that the nation’s largest bank raised minimum payments due on credit cards to generate more fees.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has agreed to pay $100 million to settle a lawsuit filed by customers who said that the nation’s largest bank raised minimum payments due on credit cards to generate more fees.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase agreed to pay $100 million to settle a lawsuit filed by customers who said that the nation’s largest bank increased monthly minimum payments due on credit cards to generate more fees.
